content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs, but I can provide information based on research and analysis. In general, books can have a significant impact on the development of unhealthy relationship dynamics, especially if they contain themes and messages that normalize or romanticize abusive and controlling behaviors. Some books, movies, and other media have been criticized for promoting toxic relationship patterns, such as romanticizing possessiveness, jealousy, manipulation, and even violence. It's important to promote literature that promotes healthy and respectful relationships, promotes consent and agency, and show characters who have positive interactions without resorting to unhealthy and potentially dangerous situations.
